thread.title: Kvelertak, Band That's Supporting Metallica On Upcoming Tour, Has A New Video Out [News]

title: Kvelertak, Band That's Supporting Metallica On Upcoming Tour, Has A New Video Out [News]
text:
Kvelertak, Band That's Supporting Metallica on Upcoming Tour, Has a New Video Out Check out "Bronsegud" off latest album "Nattesferd" inside. Posted 14 hours ago 5 
Norwegian metalliers Kvelertak, who were announced as special guests of Metallica's upcoming European tour , have released a video for "Bronsegud" track off their latest third studio album, 2016's " Nattesferd ." 
You can check it all out in the embedded video player below. 4 months ago in Interviews , 13 comments 6 10 months ago in New releases , 4 comments 16 11 months ago in New releases , 14 comments Trending stories 12 hours ago in Features , 39 comments 18 12 hours ago in Music news , 35 comments 3 4 comments sorted by best / new / date Post a comment Great band! Lars is probably so happy about this, he's stated that he loves them! 3 MetalliBucket 50 · 14 hours ago · permalink · ↑ reply A year from now I´ll hear this live!! Yes!! I like it. The energy!! It´s so refreshing to hear something that´s not fucking emo djent. And people seem to be rocking out instead of filming or performing martial arts, cool! Playing on tour with Metallica must be a fucking catapult for your band. Good for them! 0 Sounds awesome. Can't wait to hear them in Amsterdam 0 Last album was all right 0
